name: TheLyingPath
description:
This game was made for the Community Game Jam 2019 theme : The game is a liar

You will find out why this game fits this theme.

Game: By the way this is a really cool game, this wasn't the first game that the developers made.

You get it? It looks like a horror game but it is a puzzle game. There really isn't a point but to reach the credits screen lol.
